title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.
highlights: pull & run models with one command

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed; sync & async clients.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Works in Node and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation memory and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators and embedders.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Specialized Ollama model fine-tuned for chemistry Q&A and molecule generation.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that exposes REST and WebSocket endpoints powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Go, Rust, C#, Swift and more.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated list of open datasets formatted for easy fine-tuning with Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest and tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library with Blazor demo and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling.

title: ollama-rag-langgraph
summary: LangGraph example implementing multi-step RAG with local Ollama models.
